title: Koh Boon Hwee

sentences.sentence: Koh Boon Hwee, DUBC (Chinese: 许文辉; born 1950) is a Singaporean businessman
Koh was educated at Saint Andrew's School, Singapore

He went on to receive a first class honours degree in mechanical engineering from the Imperial College of Science and Technology, University of London, and an MBA (Distinction) from the Harvard Business School
Koh was appointed Chairman of the Singapore Telecom Group in 1986 and then joined the Singapore Airlines board in March 2001.

He served as Chairman of the SIA Engineering Company; a Director of Agilent Technologies Inc, Four Soft Ltd and Norelco UMS Holdings Limited; Executive Director of MediaRing Limited and Tech Group Asia Limited
He serves on the boards of Temasek Holdings (Private) Limited as a Director; AAC Acoustic Technologies Holdings Ltd and Infiniti Solutions Private Limited
He is also a Council Member of the Singapore Business Federation
On 1 January 2006, Koh became chairman of DBS Bank
He joined DBS as a director on 15 June 2005. He stepped down on 30 April 2010, replaced by Peter Seah
At the 2008 National Day Awards, Koh was awarded the Darjah Utama Bakti Cemerlang (Distinguished Service Order)
